Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n1u9wffNoM1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/zwIL2JQJl64" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>Xaiier</strong>'s*<a href="http://bit.ly/1eP9F52"><strong>Time Control</strong>*</a>mod allows you to slow down time to*1/64x while in flight. Slow down physics delta time and game speed to a smooth and satisfying crawl, allowing you to have full control over every element of your flight, ship and everything else without any need to rush. You can change the rails rates and soon, you can even attempt hyper speed!</p>

<p>Click*<a href="http://bit.ly/1eP9F52"><strong>HERE</strong></a>*for more info about*<strong>Time Control</strong>.</p>
Oh yeah, we can smoothly fly 1000 part ships now! Downside is that we can only do that in slow motion but at least we have the choice now!

It's like Dynamic Warp Mod I think. I'm using Dynamic Warp for my KSP Videos, my PC isn't good enough to play KSP with high graphics, so I decrease game speed and speed the video up after recording. It's very usefull.

Wow, I'm honored! This is so cool!

It's designed as the successor to Dynamic Warp, as that plugin hasn't been properly updated in forever nor is it readily available anymore.

Wow, really cool mod! Will look into this, I imagine KSP cinematic makers like Nassault could benefit from this (assuming they're not using it already).

Has anyone at Squad taken notice of the Distant Object Enhancement mod? I found out about it a couple days ago and it's definitely worthy of a Modding Mondays feature.
nice! hopefully i can compensate my surface lag (i've got bad bad surface lags since .23) with this and can land my planes/shuttles
